body.name: Karinear 110v Electric Cooktop 2 Burners, 12'' Electric Stove Top with Plug in, Knob Control Countertop & Built-in Ceramic Cooktop, 9 Heating Level, Hot Warning, Over-Temperature Protection
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs 31 mins
features: 【110-120v Plug in Electric Cooktop 】This portable electric stove top is suitable for use at 110~120v, comes with a plug, plug and play anytime, anywhere, no need to find an electrician to help install.If you think other 220v electric cooktop are troublesome to install, I think you need this 110 volt kitchen stove very much.

【Knob Control, Easy to Use】This 120 volt cooktop is operated by knob, it hasn't any complicated function buttons, knob control electric cooktop is very simple to use, perfectly for the elderly or people with poor eyesight. Once powered on, the electric ceramic cooktop can be heated by gently twisting the knob, and the electric cooktop 2 burners has 9 heating levels to meet the needs of any food at different temperatures.

【Built-in & Countertop Electric Cooktop】This 110v stove can be placed in two ways. If you don't want to be so troublesome, you can put the 12'' electric cooktop directly on the countertop, but you need to install its four bottom brackets. If you want it to look more beautiful and save more space, you can also open holes in the cabinet and install the 2 burners electric stove top embedded. Cut-out size: 19.3 in * 10.6 in

【Safe and Reliable Electric Ceramic Cooktop】This electric hob is safer to use because it is an electric ceramic stove, not an induction cooktop. It has no electromagnetic radiation. Moreover, it has built-in overheat protection and residual heat indication functions. You don't have to worry about gas leakage and open fire spread. In order to better protect your family, this 120v stove is a good choice.

【Compatible with Any Cooker】Another advantage of this glass cooktop is that it can use any material cooker, iron, stainless steel, glass, ceramic cookers are suitable, which is much more convenient than the induction cooker. With black glass surface, the drop-in electric cooktop looks simple and fashionable. Easy to clean, just wipe with a damp cloth. You can cook with multiple burners at the same time, making Christmas, Thanksgiving, Easter and other holiday dinners more easy.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Are you still looking for an electric stove with a plug? Are you troubled by the installation of the electric cooktop? Karinear will solve your troubles for you, then please let me introduce this product to you, I believe it will be your favorite. This 2 burner electric cooktop is suitable for American families with a voltage of 110~120v. It has a plug. You don't need to ask an electrician to install it, which can save more money.

Electric Cooktop Features 110-120V with Outlet Plug Knob Control 9 Power Levels Auto Shutdown Residual Heat Indicator Over-Temperature Protection No Electromagnetic Radiation Compatible with Any Cookware Built-in & Countertop Electric Cooktop Install Stove top Size:20.5in(520mm)*11.4in(290mm)*2.1(54mm) Cut-out Size:19.3in(490mm)*10.6in(270mm)

Countertop & Drop-in Electric Radiant Cooktop This portable electric cooktop can be installed in two ways, which is very convenient. If you are afraid of trouble, you can choose to use it directly on the desktop, but install its four bottom brackets; You can also install it embedded by opening holes in the cabinet.

Knob Control Electric Stovetop Easy to Use There are no complicated function buttons. It only has two knobs to control heating. Each knob corresponds to a burner, which is very simple to use, and is very suitable for the elderly or people with poor eyesight. 600+1400W & 9 Power Levels The large burner of the two burners electric cooktop power is 1400W, it is faster heating. The small burner is 600W. Each burner has 9 heating speeds to choose from, suitable for a variety of food needs for temperature. Residual Heat Indicator If the screen of the black glass cooktop shows "H", the glass panel is very hot, please do not touch the glass stove top with your hands.

Safe 12'' Electric Cooktop It has built-in overheat protection, auto shutdown and residual heat indication functions. You needn't worry about gas leakage and open fire spread. It has no electromagnetic radiation.It is also safe for pregnant women to use it.In order to better protect your family, this 120v stove is a good choice. It is an electric ceramic stove, it isn't an induction cooker, so it hasn't electromagnetic radiation,harmless to pregnant women. It can be compatible with any material, such as iron, stainless steel, glass, ceramic. Unlike induction cookers, only iron pans can be used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice finish, easy to clean, scratches easily, portable
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty good and intuitive burner plate.Pros: looks good, heavy grade, nice finish, one panel heats quite well for larger pots, the other heats slowly good for a small pot or a simmer.Can use on non induction pansCons. Scratches or staims relatively easily. Probably benfit with a electric plate glass cleaner fluid. A little heavy if you have a small kitchen, picking up and putting away after meals is tedius, best remains on the counter.Its generally a good product for the price and I cant comment on longivity but so far it does what it was purchased for, and everything that came in the package along with quality matches what was advertisedThe plug in was convinient. I woulf recommend anyone using both burners be warmed this does take more than 15AMP with a 120v, so breakers with 15Amp sockets Should NOT be used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome little electric cooktop - portable to use wherever you want.
reviews.reviewText: I’m blown away by this little cooktop. I especially like that this can be used as a portable cooktop that I can put on the countertop or the outdoor picnic table!This is NOT an induction cooktop but a regular conduction electric heat system that is compatible with all types of cookware. That means it gets hot and the difference between old exposed electric heating elements is this has a ceramic glass cover over the heating elements.There are two heating zones, one is a small 6.5-inch diameter and the other is a large 7.75-inch diameter. The large burner has 9 different temperature settings while the small burner only has low and high.This thing works great. The materials are good quality. It is durable and easy to use. The attached 120v plug makes it easy to plug in anywhere. The touch controls are simple and intuitive. I didn’t need to read the instructions to understand how to use it. It heats up quickly and evenly.I really like that the heating elements are sealed so no food, crumbs or anything else gets into the burner. It makes it super easy to clean with a simple wipe down.It comes with hardware for installing it flush into a countertop or if you decide like me to keep it portable there are 4 rubber feet that are screwed to the bottom. The sides are the bare metal housing, I might try to make a decorative frame for it but there appears to be some cooling holes that must be considered in my design.I love that I can take it out to the bar-b-q outdoor events or use as warmer for party server. It is also great having an extra cooktop during the holidays when there is so much to cook giving me two extra burners. I keep in the pantry when I don’t need it. It’s perfect for using on the table for fondue or group hot pot. I used it at a party for keeping chocolate melted for strawberry dipping!Finally, there is a website with a support email address and warranty registration for the 3-year warranty. This gives me a bit of confidence that the product is well designed and reliable. I’m glad I got it.

I recently ordered this electric cooktop – the model with touch controls. It’s plug-and-play, super simple with no additional wires involved, and you're ready to cook.The cooktop operates at 110v, and the ceramic surface ensures even heat distribution. The touch control panel is modern and sleek with good sensitivity and simple button distribution. The controls include a child safety lock, which can be a valuable feature for households with young children. The timer and pause functions are also convenient if you need to walk away briefly.However, it's important to note that this cooktop isn't exactly two cooktops; rather, it has one powerful 1400W burner and one smaller 600W burner designed for keeping food warm or slow reheating. The larger burner works exceptionally well for cooking, heating up quickly, and handling larger portions efficiently. I tested the smaller burner, and as expected (as per the product description), it takes about 6 minutes to fry an egg. It's ideal for its designated purpose but not meant for extensive cooking. The safety feature that turns off the burners when you remove the pot or pan is really nice, don’t have to worry about accidentally leaving anything on.Cleaning is amazingly simple due to the black tempered glass covering the entire surface without any gaps. I just wipe it down, and the cooktop is clean and ready for the next use. The build quality is sturdy, and I believe this cooktop should last for a long time of extended use. I recommend this product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Plaque de cuisson très pratique et facile d'usage.
reviews.reviewText: Ajouté une prise de courant (16A) non livrée et fabriqué un cadre en bois avec des ouvertures sur les 4 côtés pour servir de support et permettre à l'air de circuler autour et en dessous du coffret métallique de la plaque de cuisson, celui-ci chauffant légèrement lorsque la table de cuisson est utilisée.Utilisation des 4 clips métalliques livrés avec la table de cuisson pour centrer le cadre en bois avec le coffret métallique et le maintenir par la même occasion.Seul le plateau en verre repose sur le cadre en bois.

reviews.reviewTitle: Tamaño y funcionalidad con una calidad a un precio bastante bueno
reviews.reviewText: La verdad que estas placas fue un encargo de una empresa de alquileres de apartamentos en los cuales utilizamos este tipo de formato para las viviendas en el que hemos buscado en varios sitio y la mayoría son más grandes o tenían malas recomendaciones por lo cual en cuanto ha llegado hemos colocado en dos domicilios que ya se encontraban estropeado y por lo menos los propietarios se encuentran a gusto con estas placas por lo cual no ha habido ningún problema ni tanto de instalación ni de uso ya que es fácil de utilizar y fácil de limpiar. Su entrega ha sido rápida y muy eficaz.
